DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pregnancy , delivery , neonatal outcome subject maintain ongoing clinical pregnancy Week 10 gestation NT-03 .
DOC.brief_title: Follow-Up Of Pregnancies Established During Study NT-03 ( Thrive-IVF Follow-Up )
DOC.detailed_description: NT-04 follow-up study include subject receive least one dose study drug maintain ongoing clinical pregnancy Week 10 gestation NT-03 . NT-04 involve administration study drug treatment . In NT-03 , subject achieve ongoing clinical pregnancy Week 8 gestation undergo repeat transvaginal ultrasound ( TVU ) Week 10 gestation ( 4 week last dose study drug ) . Subjects pregnant Week 10 gestation enrol NT-04 . Subjects NT-04 contact telephone every 6 8 week Week 38 gestation , time subject contact every two week confirmation delivery . Information pregnancy status use prescription medication collect telephone interview . Between Weeks 18 22 gestation , obstetrical ultrasound perform . Following delivery , additional information obtain , include pregnancy outcome , gestational age delivery , etc . Standardized photograph take part newborn assessment .
DOC.criteria: At least one dose study drug administer NT03 Ongoing clinical pregnancy Week 10 gestation Able willing enroll NT04 â€¢ None
